short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool with which you can add your professional email signature to your email service and helps you save time and effort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create multiple email signatures in just a few clicks and add the Chrome extension to your email service provider with Name.Page. The Name.Page Chrome extension provides users with a hassle-free experience of attaching their email signatures to all the emails that they send out.

What do you get with the Name.Page Chrome Extension:

1. Add and manage more than one email signature to your extension.
2. Choose an email signature to be the default and switch between signatures seamlessly.
3. Edit and customize your email signature from the comfort of your email service provider in an instant instead of switching between platforms.
4. Change the settings of your email signature.
5. Opt whether or not to add your email signature to particular emails in just one click by pressing on "No Signature".
6. Set a default signature in "My Signature" from multiple email signatures and reduce manual effort.
7. Put an end to copying and pasting email signatures every time you send out emails and add email signatures in Fast Track through the extension.
8. See the preview of how your email signature looks on your email before sending it out.
9. Add a campaign banner for all your promotional activities along with social media handles.
10. Add disclaimers to your email signature that you would like to convey to your audience.
11. Manage multiple email signatures with no technical assistance or prior software knowledge.


Currently, the Name.Page email signature extension supports **Gmail** and **Yahoo mail** service providers.

All Gmail users can access their email signatures directly from their inbox after they have added the extension. They can choose whether to add or not, and if they do, which signature to add once they start composing their email.

Name.Page is not restricted to any detail being added to the email signature. All the details that the users have provided in the email signature can be added as a whole through the extension.
